name: MINED OUT
description:
GAME

This is still a work in progress/early build of the project. 

Includes controller support, auto-saving progress and 17 levels!

CURRENT VERSION: V.1.0

----------------------------------

CONTROLS & HOW TO PLAY

Use your movement and hammer smash to escape a series of caves!

MOVEMENT - DPAD / ANALOG STICK / KEYS LEFT & RIGHT

JUMP - X / A / SPACE BAR

HAMMER - X / A / SPACE BAR (in the air)

Facing LEFT or RIGHT will determine the direction of rotation.

Collect all the KEYS to activate the elevator at the end of each level.

Some keys are found in CHESTS too, which need to be unlocked by landing on them.

----------------------------------

CREDITS
